basics.label: Project Manager and Photographer
basics.summary: Executive Assistant who is skilled at multi-tasking and maintaining a strong attention to detail. Employs professionalism and superior communication skills to meet client and company needs.Highly focused and results-oriented office professional who successfully supports complex, deadline-driven operations. Customer-oriented and computer-savvy.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Professionally trained through the military. Over 15+ years of experience with digital photography. Project manager and freelance photographer. Event photographer for weddings, bridal showers, prom and graduation photos.
highlights: Scheduled events, planned and coordinated venues
Provided customers with digital photography of events

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Market and sell high quality kitchen tools and accessories through in-home demonstrations, booths at trade shows, and fundraiser programs. Provided excellent marketing, sales, demonstrations, order entry, shipping, receiving and customer service.
highlights: Maintained inventory, accounting and data entry for small business

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Provided timely and accurate tax preparation and advice for individuals, families and businesses. Perform e-filing tasks as per schedule, addressed complex tax issues and tax deduction problems of clients.
highlights: Achieved 100% customer satisfaction and client retention utilizing company guided client relations techniques

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Honorable discharge after 20 years as a Naval intelligence analyst. Compared, correlated and disseminated valuable intelligence information to executive level directors during global crisis like 9/11, Haitian earthquake, and the Malaysian tsunami. Living overseas in Italy as an operational intelligence analyst providing analysis and administrative assistance at an executive level.
highlights: Leading Petty Officer of a division of 30 junior enlisted sailors
